title: New: MARITZA – Dans Un Autre Regard
content:
French was never my strong point at school, a fact that I’m sure my teacher would testify to.

Hence I have no idea whatsoever about the subject matter of this new track from Montréal’s MARITZA, not that it really makes too much difference with music this downright beautiful. Dans Un Autre Regard is a delicate acoustic-styled number, taking in influences such as Feist and Regina Spektor. The fact I have no idea what MARITZA is singing about actually adds to the level of intrigue and mystic; I can’t help but be enchanted.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
